meanings.sent1: The dog sicks after eating too quickly.

meanings.definition: A slang term for something that is cool or impressive.
meanings.sent1: His new car is sicks; everyone admires it.
meanings.sent2: The latest video game is so sicks; I can't stop playing.
meanings.sent3: The concert was sicks, and I had a great time.
meanings.sent4: The skateboard tricks he did were sicks!
